data.text: Woe to them that are at ease in Zion,
Pass ye unto Calneh, and see;
Ye that put far away the evil day,
That lie upon beds of ivory,
That chant to the sound of the viol,
Therefore now shall they go captive with the first that go captive,
The Lord God hath sworn by himself, saith the Lord the God of hosts,
And it shall come to pass, if there remain ten men in one house, that they shall die.
And a manâ€™s uncle shall take him up, and he that burneth him,
Shall horses run upon the rock?
Ye which rejoice in a thing of nought,
But behold, I will raise up against you a nation, O house of Israel, saith the Lord the God of hosts;
